description: This file defines a React hook called useAuth that manages user authentication state, including storing a token and user info, and provides login and logout functions. It includes placeholders for further implementation such as token persistence and profile fetching.

methods.name: useAuth()
methods.description: A React hook that manages authentication state, providing methods for login and logout, and maintains internal state for the user info and token.

methods.name: login(email, password)
methods.description: Simulates user login by setting dummy token and user state; intended to be replaced with actual API call for authentication.

methods.name: logout()
methods.description: Clears authentication state by resetting token and user info to null.
